conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully converts the 2D floor plan into a 3D cutaway isometric representation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clearly defined wall heights, thickness, and volumetric floors.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong layout fidelity; room proportions and adjacencies like the central pantry and stairwell are accurate. Some window/door placements on the perimeter are slightly simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture blocks (sofa, kitchen island, cabinets) are present and logically placed according to the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no UI clutter. The lighting allows for excellent visibility of the inner rooms.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings on the right-side wall are merged or not as distinct as the 2D plan indicates.

summary: A highly faithful 3D conversion that accurately captures the complex internal layout and furniture placements of the original architectural drawing.
